panels.description: CPU throttling of the Event Gateway pods.

targets.expr: sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", pod=~"event-gateway-.*", container!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod, container) /sum(increase(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{job="kubelet", metrics_path="/metrics/cadvisor", pod=~"event-gateway-.*", container!=""}[$__rate_interval])) by (pod, container)

panels.title: CPU Throttling
